SHORT_DESCR.P: The objective of the contract is to enter into Framework Agreements for trade services in connection with sudden and planned operation and maintenance works, renovation projects, reconstructions, etc. The Framework Agreements are nationwide. See the tender documentation.
— glass works (all works included in all disciplines shall either be covered by own organisation, or by cooperation with other contractors).

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The Contracting Authority has the option to extend the Agreement on the same conditions by 1 + 1 years, so that the total possible length of the Agreement is 4 years.
